text:
"...You're outside right now?
If it's not a good time, I can call back later..."
It's okay, I'm already on my way home.

I was just stopping by a jazz bar.
I wanted to listen to some calming music...
"That sounds nice, it seems like it'll be refreshing."

Hehe, yes.
I had a little bit of alcohol too... it was fun.

"...Could it be that you're bothered by something
mentioned during the last shoot?"

Producer-san,
Sometimes, I find myself yearning to be a bad girl.

It's not like I'm going through a rebellious phase,
but today... I just felt like it.
